name: Trucking Loaded
description:
My submission to the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1

Trucking Loaded is a simple puzzler where the player has to guide a truck from point A to point B. However, there are obstacles on the way that the player has to take care of for the truck to safely get to it's destination.

It currently features a soundtrack of 4 hand tailored tracks. Nothing to brag about but worth noting nevertheless.

I didn't really think that the game would perform so good in-browser. That's the reason why the pause menu didn't get an "un-pause" button.
